dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale note on map: "Scala milliarium germanica italica".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text below map: Il Turco abbraccia co'l fuo imperio grandissimi membri...
At head of title: Libro quarto. Gran Turco. 173.
Appears in Ortelius's Theatrum orbis terrarum. Antwerp, 1574.
